title: Thousands of Authors Ask AI Chatbot Owners to Pay for Use of Their Work
description: James Patterson and Margaret Atwood are among writers who have joined the call for compensation.

title: Meta and Microsoft Team Up to Distribute New AI Software for Commercial Use
description: The Meta AI model, dubbed Llama 2, will be free and available to developers building software on Microsoft’s Azure cloud-computing platform.

title: European Spyware Firms Threaten Global Security and Privacy, U.S. Says
description: The Biden administration bans Cytrox and Intellexa from receiving U.S. technology amid rising concern over hacking tools

title: People Have Begun to Love Apple's Most Hated Product
description: Tim Cook once apologized for Apple Maps; now it is the preferred navigation app for some.
